basic.description: An examination of major issues in contemporary metaphysics. Possible topics include causation, properties, time, modal theory, and induction.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Current Issues Metaphysics II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).
